#include<iostream>
#include<math.h>

using namespace std;
int count(int);
int main()
{
 int i,j=0,k=0,l=0;
 cin>>i;

 while(i>0)
 {
     j=j+i%10;
     i=i/10;
     l=j;
 }

 while(j>0)
 {
     k=k+j%10;
     j=j/10;
     l=k;
 }
  while(k>0)
 {
     l=0;
     l=l+k%10;
     k=k/10;

 }
 cout<<l<<endl;



 return 0;
}
